procedure.name: Search
procedure.action: SELECT distinct Course.* , Course.id as course_id FROM [coursesplatformd].[dbo].[CourseTag] , [coursesplatformd].[dbo].[Course] where [coursesplatformd].[dbo].[CourseTag].course_id = [coursesplatformd].[dbo].[Course].id AND [coursesplatformd].[dbo].[CourseTag].[soundex] in ({0});
